context.name: accessibility

output: Properties and values for hiding elements accessibly

description: Default breakpoints for palm, lap, lap-and-up, portable, desk, and retina. Predefine this map to override.

context.name: breakpoints
context.value:
(
    "palm"          "screen and (max-width: 44.9375em)",
    "lap"           "screen and (min-width: 45em) and (max-width: 63.9375em)",
    "lap-and-up"    "screen and (min-width: 45em)",
    "portable"      "screen and (max-width: 63.9375em)",
    "desk"          "screen and (min-width: 64em)",
    "retina"        "(-webkit-min-device-pixel-ratio: 2), (min-resolution: 192dpi), (min-resolution: 2dppx)"
)
